title: To all those who cry about autofill
body:
What happened to draft pick overtime according to my experience:
1. People were complaining about not getting their role in the old draft because according to whose picking first, they get to choose the role they get.
2. Dynamic queue took like 5-30 min to find 1 match.
3. Now with autofill, people complain about not getting their role.

Now look folks, with the new draft, you ask for a role. Unlike back then you have people that would say mid or feed and all of that. Would you rather let rng decide your fate with the old draft or let autofill remain in which you have an higher chance of getting your actual role because autofill turns on and off

> Play supports. Problem solved.

lol I main support
Remove flex Q, ta da I just fixed the queue time problem, and no autofill is needed

Autofil is there to fix the problem of support players being proportionally fewer than the rest of the roles, not of there not being enough players in general. It's a bottleneck issue, so increasing the pool in a cross section is not going to solve anything.
